entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to affect the road until early afternoon and again overnight. 2 to 4 cm of snow may accumulate on the road near the summit until early afternoon, with lesser amounts to lower levels. Further snow is likely overnight Monday to Tuesday with another 1 to 2 cm accumulating near the summit.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is possible above 500 metres early Tuesday morning. 1 to 2 cm of snow may accumulate near the summit with lesser amounts lower down.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to develop around midnight Monday. 2 to 4 cm of snow may accumulate about the summit early Tuesday morning and lesser amounts down to 600 metres. Snow showers may continue to affect eastern parts of the road down to 300 metres through Tuesday morning and afternoon and 1 to 2 cm may accumulate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow may affect the summit of the road this afternoon and again overnight. Between mid-afternoon and early evening 1-2 cm of snow may accumulate at the summit, with lesser amounts down to 700 metres. Further snow is possible overnight Monday to Tuesday with less than 1 cm above 600 metres accumulating.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to affect the road Monday evening and Tuesday morning. 5 to 10 cm of snow could accumulate down to 600 metres, with lesser amounts to lower levels. Snow showers may continue into Tuesday evening but accumulations for the road are not expected to be significant.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to lower to 800 metres this morning. 1 to 2 cm of snow may accumulate on the road about the summit until mid afternoon, with lesser amounts lower down. Further snow showers are expected tonight and early Tuesday morning, when 1 cm may accumulate at times above 400 metres.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Showers may fall as snow about the summit of the road early Tuesday morning, when 1 to 2 cm may accumulate.

entry.summary: Snow showers are expected to affect the road above 700 metres Tuesday afternoon and evening. 2 to 4 cm may accumulate about and south of the summit, with lesser amounts further north.
